dataForPlot = housing_df.groupby('CHAS').mean().MEDV
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.bar(dataForPlot.index, dataForPlot, color=['C5', 'C1'])
ax.set_xlabel('CHAS')
ax.set_ylabel('Avg.MEDV')
plt.show()
